name: The Root (Popletox)
description:
This game was made as an entry for the Global Game Jam 2023 in the Universidad Complutense de Madrid campus between February 3 and 5. In this 48 hours all the elements of the game were desing and developed by the team listed below. The theme for this jam was Root.

Developed by

Alex Ferrin Alcivar

Diego Giménez Romanillos

Luis Fernández Freire

Marco Expósito Pérez

Miguel Ángel Torrijos González

Music by

Álvaro Sardina

Pepe Pérez
